mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply_table(replyWriter, replyContents, commentId, createdAt) VALUES(#{replyWriter}, #{replyContents}, #{commentId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, replyWriter, replyContents, commentId, DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createdAt FROM reply_table WHERE commentId = #{commentId} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, replyWriter, replyContents, commentId, DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createdAt FROM reply_table WHERE id = #{id}
